name: Scrabble
description: Scrabble is a word game in which two to four players score points by placing tiles, each bearing a single letter, onto a game board which is divided into a 15Ã—15 grid of squares.
basicRules: Each player draws seven letter tiles from a bag.
The first player forms a word with two or more of their tiles and places it on the board to read either across or down with one letter on the center square.
Players then take turns adding words to the board. Each new word must connect to a word already on the board.
A player completes a turn by counting and announcing their score for that turn. They then draw new tiles to replenish their hand to seven tiles.
The game ends when all tiles have been drawn and one player uses their last tile, or when all possible plays have been made.
The player with the highest score wins the game.
tips: Learn the two-letter words, they are very useful.
Look for opportunities to use the premium squares on the board (double letter score, triple word score, etc.).
Don't be afraid to change your tiles if you have a bad hand.
